On Fri, Sep 11, 2009 at 10:16 AM, Bill Burke <bburke@...> wrote:
> I like the version param because it allows the default
> "application/myformat" to get the latest version. if you do
> "application/myformat.v2" then you don't have this.

That is a bug, not a feature.  One hard and fast rule of good version
management is that any request that works to day will continue to
working in a compatible way or fail with an explicit error.

You never want new versions of a system to break existing clients
(unless you are explicitly EOLing the API version), even if they are
imperfectly implemented.  Having an identical request quietly work
today in a that is incompatible with how it worked yesterday is not
acceptable to me.

--
Peter Williams
http://barelyenough.org
